answers.answer: All babies grow at their own pace. Your baby is just perfect! I'm 28 and 3 days and 3 weeks ago my babe weighed 2.2 lbs! Which according to this app is where she should be this week!
At my last appointment I was at 21 weeks and they told me my son was 1lb and 4oz, and my next appointment is this Monday and I'm 25 weeks and I'm excited to see his estimated weight!!
I was 25 weeks 1 day, the baby was 2 pounds.
At my 27 week scan my baby weighed 2 lb 11 oz ..Midwife said that was absolutely fine.

We only get size measurements here in Ireland, which relates to gestational time. When I was 27 weeks exactly, my boy measured 28w 6!! Apparently that's within range but I think it sounds huge. Obviously Id rather he was measuring small for an easier delivery!!
I last got measured at a growth scan 5 days ago at 28 +5 and got told baby is weighing around 3lbs and didn't have any concerns so I'm guessing it's nothing to worry about x

R u guys getting sonogram during every prenatal visit? Or how do they determine how much the baby weight without a sonogram.. I got the initial sonogram n one during the 2nd trimester for measurements n that's it. Or am I gonna start getting sonograms in every prenatal visit?

question: I'm almost 28 weeks and was just at my obg appointment, to which she said I'm 100% healthy, no gestational diabetes, and great hemoglobin levels, baby is also 100% healthy and on track. She said he weight about 2.5lbs and I didn't know if that was big for 27 weeks? She said it's perfect, but this site makes it seem like that's big. Anyone else think so?
title: How much does your baby weigh?
